title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: 4Q Fundraising WI-Sen: Mandela Barnes (D): $1.2 million raised AR-Gov: Sarah Huckabee Sanders (R): $1.6 million raised, $7 million cash-on-hand MD-Gov: Kelly Schulz (R): $1.5 million raised (in 2021), $1.1 million cash-on-hand MN-Gov: Michelle Benson (R): $213,000 raised (in four months) NY-Gov: Jumaane Williams (D): $222,000 (since November) RI-Gov: Helena Foulkes (D): $965,000 raised, additional $100,000 self-funded, $830,000 cash-on-hand Senate ? OH-Sen: It seems to be internal polling release season for Ohio's Republican Senate candidates, as businessman Bernie Moreno has dropped new numbers from Chip Englander and Kellyanne Conway (yes, that Kellyanne Conway) to argue that his $4 million ad campaign has helped him gain ground ahead of the May primary.
title: Morning Digest: Republican launches rematch for governor in Connecticut after close 2018 race
